channel.title: pyro on iPardalis - Ambilobe Panther Chameleons for sale. Panther chameleons for sale near me.
channel.description: Recent content in pyro on iPardalis - Ambilobe Panther Chameleons for sale. Panther chameleons for sale near me.

item.title: Jiolahy
item.description: Jiolahy is a big F1 female from Chameleons 101’s The Don (WC). She brings fresh ybbb genetics combined with a great CB ybbb line created by Modern Day Dragons. We are very lucky to have her in our breeding group. Jiolahy Filial F1-CG5 Sire The Don (WC) Dam Perregrin/Pyro’s Daughter 5 Generation Tree Ancestral Report for Jiolahy (F1-CG5) Generation 1 1. Jiolahy (F1-CG5). Jiolahy was born on 2021-07-14 at Eric Thompson.

item.title: paige
item.description: Paige is a solid Modern Day Dragons x Tropical Chameleons YBBB female. She has great purples and pinks and a wonderful personality. We are very lucky to have her in our project and comes to us from Tiffany Mallay. Her first pairing will be with our 4th gen sire, Tony. Paige Paige1 Paige2 Filial F4-CG13 Sire PJ Dam Sonny’s Daughter 5 Generation Tree Ancestral Report for Paige (F4-CG13) Generation 1 1.

item.title: manjaya
item.description: Manjaya s Manjaka’s sister and she brings fresh genetics from a new WC sire, Arlo, who was acclimated by Chris Neeley at Colorado Chameleon. Arlo has a distinct look with red sprinkled on blue bars and a nice yellow body. Very cool Ambilobe import and one of the nicer ybbb with red highlights to come in the past few years. We are very lucky to have the opportunity to work with his daughters!
